title: How to Change to a Different Character in Fortnite

steps.title: Launch Fortnite
steps.content: Launch Fortnite . Fortnite is available on PC/Mac, mobile, PlayStation, Xbox consoles , and Nintendo Switch . You must have purchased or received a skin in the Item Shop. If you don't have any skins, Fortnite will randomly select a default character for you. This will rotate automatically every few matches. [1] X Research source This also applies to gender. You won't be able to select a specific gender; this will be randomized unless you have a specific character with a certain gender. If you don't have any skins, you'll need to purchase V-Bucks in the V-Bucks tab. [2] X Research source Then, head to the Item Shop and select a skin to buy it. You can also receive skins as a gift from friends through the Gift feature. Though very rare, you can sometimes earn free skins during limited-time special events. Be sure to keep an eye out for any announcements on the homepage.

steps.title: Select Locker.
steps.content: Select Locker . This will be at the top, between Compete and Item Shop . [3] X Research source

steps.title: Select the T-Shirt tile.
steps.content: Select the T-Shirt tile. This is the tile to the left of the backpack tile. A new page will open with all available outfits. [4] X Research source If you already have a character equipped, you'll see your current skin instead of the T-shirt tile.

steps.title: Select an outfit.
steps.content: Select an outfit. An outfit is a character along with any alternate skins. You can select an outfit to see a preview. If an outfit has an alternate skin, you can select Edit Style to select it.

steps.title: Select Equip.
steps.content: Select Equip . This is at the very bottom of the screen. You'll now see the character equipped on the Play tab. [5] X Research source When you play with friends , they'll be able to see your new skin. Fortnite skins do not have a competitive advantage. They all have the same hitbox, so you don't have to worry about larger characters taking more damage. However, if your character wears all black or a certain color that allows them to blend in with the surroundings, this can help you avoid potential enemies.
